title: The city and country's loyalty; or, The gallant resolution of the kingdom to defend the same against the invasion of the French, voluntarily engaging thmeselves [sic] in the defence of King William Queen and [sic] Mary. To the tune of, Valiant Jockey, &c.
publisher: Printed for C. Bates, next door to the Crown-Tavern, at Duck Lane-end, in West-Smithfield.,
